name: Turtle Racer
description:
Turtle Racer is an educational racing game designed for players to learn about biological marine life and their environment.

Players take the role of the humble sea turtle as they explore the ocean to learn about sea life and test their knowledge in a thrilling race through an exotic ocean trench!

Players have access to two different game modes:
  • A free, relaxed exploration of the ocean floor where they learn various facts about ocean life.
  • The exciting and fast-paced race where your knowledge on marine biology may be the only thing between victory or defeat.

Play the game as you wish!

Confident in your marine knowledge? Head straight into the race! If not, take your time and learn about the secrets of sea life. But be warned, throughout your race the sea will present various questions to you. Swim through the correct answer and the ocean current will give your turtle a brief speed boost! But answer wrong and your opponent may pull ahead.
publishers: TDSDP is Transdisciplinary Data Scholars Development Program (TDSDP) - TDSDP Games Transdisciplinary
